Okay, so let's lay out what everyone knows.

Kerbin Intrepid general crew Kerbulus Kenlie
The Intrepid may be in trouble We have no transponder, and no way to communicate with Kerbin There is another planet opposite Kerbulus, filled with a race of poor tactical decision-makers who have nuclear weapons. Kerbulus is filled with a race of warlike being that would kill them all and conquer Kerbin at the drop of a hat.
There is another planet opposite Kerbin There is another planet opposite Kerbin The Interpid is not headed to Kerbulus He can learn more about Evil Kenlie's actions via magic link.
There's no way that ifthere's anyone on said planet, they're hostile There's no way that ifthere's anyone on said planet, they're hostile Evil Kenlie can learn about Kenlie's actions via magic link.

wanted to share this:

Quote

memory leak and partially broken loop often happen due to programm size nowdays and various assembly library they call.

Pong(atari 2600) is a fo KiloOctets not using that much *.dll while most nowdays gamesize are huge and have to work with a large set of Operating System and Specifics hardware and there drivers and various library. (not even speaking of various update frequency at all level)

Follow the troubleshooting procedure in first post to help the dev identifying where the leak you experience might come from.
